title: Exhibition
description: A hot romance in nine parts...Welcome to the Plume – where members are bound by desire and fantasies come true…An exhibition of his photographs in a prestigious art gallery is Master Rex’s dream come true, but his partner fears the will this public display of Rex’s photographs taken inside the club expose the Plume's membership to new possibilities - or peril? Meanwhile, Mike introduces Joanna to his friend Eric, as his plan to fulfill her fantasy of being shared, only to have second thoughts. Will the cost of Joanna's desire be Mike's love?
author: Ella Ardent
